CompilerSwitches.h File Reference

Detailed Description

This file defines the compiler switches used by the operational classes of the OBS Framework.

This file is #included by all body files of the OBS Framework. Note that compiler switches used by the test classes are defined in a dedicated header file (TestCompilerSwitches)

Definition in file CompilerSwitches.h.
